entity.name: node
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT(finds.id) as id, CONCAT('finds-',finds.id) AS findIdentifier, finds.old_findID, finds.objecttype, finds.broadperiod, finds.description, p1.term AS periodFromName, finds.objdate1period AS periodFrom, finds.objdate1subperiod AS fromsubperiod, finds.objdate1subperiod AS tosubperiod, p2.term AS periodToName, finds.objdate2period AS periodTo, finds.notes AS notes, findspots.county AS county, finds.classification, finds.subclass As subClassification, finds.smr_ref AS smrRef, finds.other_ref AS otherRef, finds.curr_loc AS currentLocation, finds.musaccno, finds.treasure, finds.treasureID AS TID, finds.subs_action as subsequentAction, subsequentActions.action as subsequentActionTerm, numdate1 AS fromdate, numdate2 AS todate, coins.obverse_description AS obverseDescription, coins.obverse_inscription AS obverseLegend, coins.reverse_description AS reverseDescription, coins.reverse_inscription AS reverseLegend, coins.reeceID AS reeceID, users.fullname AS createdBy, finds.material1 AS material, mat.term AS materialTerm, finds.manmethod AS manufacture, manufactures.term AS manufactureTerm, finds.preservation, preservations.term AS preservationTerm, finds.surftreat AS surface, surftreatments.term AS treatment, finds.decstyle, decstyles.term AS decstyleTerm, decmethods.term AS decmethod, finds.discmethod as discovery, discmethods.method AS discoveryMethod, finds.completeness, completeness.term AS completenessTerm, coins.denomination, denominations.denomination AS denominationName, coins.mint_id AS mint, mints.mint_name AS mintName, finds.culture, cultures.term AS cultureName, inscription, coins.ruler_id AS ruler, coins.ruler2_id AS ruler2, rulers.issuer AS rulerName, r2.issuer AS secondaryRulerName, slides.imageID AS thumbnail, secwfstage AS workflow, slides.filename AS filename, users.imagedir AS imagedir, finds.institution, findspots.knownas, findspots.fourFigure, findspots.gridref, findspots.district, findspots.parish, findspots.woeid, declong AS longitude, declat AS latitude, finds.rally, finds.rallyID, rallies.rally_name AS rallyName, finds.created, coins.tribe, ironagetribes.tribe AS tribeName, cciNumber, allen_type AS allenType, mack_type AS mackType, bmc_type AS bmcType, rudd_type AS abcType, va_type AS vaType, reverse_mintmark AS mintmark, coins.categoryID as category, medievalcategories.category AS categoryTerm, coins.typeID as type, medievaltypes.type AS typeTerm, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM datefound1) AS discovered, die_axis_measurement AS axis, CONCAT(declat,',',declong) AS coordinates, CONCAT(geographyironage.region,' ',geographyironage.area) AS geography, coins.geographyID, finds.hoard, findspots.regionID, regions.region AS regionName, finds.hoardID as hID, hoards.term AS hoardName, coins.moneyer, moneyers.name AS moneyerName, finds.datefound1, finds.datefound2, finds.findofnote AS note, findofnotereasons.term as reason FROM finds LEFT JOIN findspots ON finds.secuid = findspots.findID LEFT JOIN coins ON finds.secuid = coins.findID LEFT JOIN moneyers ON coins.moneyer = moneyers.id LEFT JOIN findofnotereasons ON finds.findofnotereason = findofnotereasons.id LEFT JOIN users ON users.id = finds.createdBy LEFT JOIN materials AS `mat` ON finds.material1 = mat.id LEFT JOIN decmethods ON finds.decmethod = decmethods.id LEFT JOIN decstyles ON finds.decstyle = decstyles.id LEFT JOIN manufactures ON finds.manmethod = manufactures.id LEFT JOIN surftreatments ON finds.surftreat = surftreatments.id LEFT JOIN completeness ON finds.completeness = completeness.id LEFT JOIN preservations ON finds.preservation = preservations.id LEFT JOIN periods AS p1 ON finds.objdate1period = p1.id LEFT JOIN periods AS p2 ON finds.objdate2period = p2.id LEFT JOIN cultures ON finds.culture = cultures.id LEFT JOIN discmethods ON discmethods.id = finds.discmethod LEFT JOIN denominations ON denominations.id = coins.denomination LEFT JOIN rulers ON rulers.id = coins.ruler_id LEFT JOIN rulers AS r2 ON r2.id = coins.ruler2_id LEFT JOIN reeceperiods ON coins.reeceID = reeceperiods.id LEFT JOIN mints ON mints.id = coins.mint_id LEFT JOIN finds_images ON finds_images.find_id = finds.secuid LEFT JOIN slides ON finds_images.image_id = slides.secuid LEFT JOIN workflowstages ON finds.secwfstage = workflowstages.id LEFT JOIN rallies ON finds.rallyID = rallies.id LEFT JOIN ironagetribes ON coins.tribe = ironagetribes.id LEFT JOIN medievalcategories ON medievalcategories.id = coins.categoryID LEFT JOIN medievaltypes ON medievaltypes.id = coins.typeID LEFT JOIN geographyironage ON geographyironage.id = coins.geographyID LEFT JOIN hoards ON finds.hoardID = hoards.id LEFT JOIN subsequentActions ON finds.subs_action = subsequentActions.id LEFT JOIN regions ON findspots.regionID = regions.id
